article_title: Bernard Schoenburg: Adam Lopez, Rob Mellon, vie to win Aaron Schock's former U.S. House seat for Democrats
article_text:
By Bernard Schoenburg , Political Writer

Posted May 23, 2015 at 10:09 PM

Updated May 23, 2015 at 11:02 PM

article_metadata.description: The candidates for the Democratic nomination for the 18th Congressional District seat vacated by former U.S. Rep. AARON SCHOCK don't think it should be a foregone conclusion that another Republican will get the job.ADAM LOPEZ and ROB MELLON both know their first challenge is against each other in the July 7 Democratic special primary. The special general election is Sept. 10Lopez, 32, notes that Schock stepped down following controversy over his campaign and governmental spending."I think the
article_metadata.author: Bernard Schoenburg, Political Writer
